title: Executive Order-Amendment of Civil Service Rules
content: Special Indian Rule No. 1 is hereby amended by adding to the places excepted from examination therein the following:
Kindergarten teachers, to be employed as such, not exceeding twenty in number. Approved, June 21, 1894.
citation: Grover Cleveland, Executive Order-Amendment of Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/206398
